com.sun.tools.visualvm.threaddump

Class ThreadDumpSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.threaddump.ThreadDumpSupport

  • public final class ThreadDumpSupport
extends Object
    Support for thread dumps in VisualVM.
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek

        Parameters:

        openView - true if taken thread dump should be opened, false otherwise.
